title: Symbols that appear in dreams indicate envy, and dreams that show the evil eye and envy.

preview.html:
html

Here are some dream symbols that indicate the evil eye, envy or magic, as well as the symbols that indicate healing from the evil eye and deliverance from envy and magic.

Dream symbols that indicate envy

  1. When the dreamer sees many kinds of predatory animals or rodents, such as rats, repeatedly in his dreams, this indicates that someone envies him for the things he does in his life. In addition, seeing beauty often, or black snakes, or even cats, dogs, hedgehogs, owls, and bats indicate envy that accompanies the dreamer in his natural life.
  2. Donkeys and pigs in a dream also indicate the envy of the dreamer. We also mention the frequent occurrence of seeing a donkey and a pig, and seeing insects and cockroaches, which indicates the envy that controls a person's life.
  3. Insects such as cockroaches also indicate a weak form of envy that afflicts the dreamer, in addition to seeing them flying from a high place or even seeing intercourse in a dream, which is a sign of envy.
  4. If the dreamer sees graves or abandoned houses in his dream, or sees black men and women, or even unknown women wearing black clothes, he should be sure here that there is someone who is jealous of him in his life.
  5. Envy in a dream can indicate the corruption of the envious person and the righteousness and piety of the person who sees himself envious in a dream
  6. Whoever envies him in a dream will do him harm, and envy may also suffer from poverty and lack of sustenance, and it is possible that envy is a sign of hatred and arrogance towards people
  7. Envy of others in a dream will make him new friends and will be intimate with him, but if others envy him in a dream, it may mean that some friends will annoy him because they want to please him.
  8. Seeing envy in a dream means that there are people who are closely following the dreamer and closely following his news and the things he does.
  9. Seeing predatory animals or monkeys a lot ~> indicates that the type of symptoms arises from Maranda and is mentioned in the Qur’an.
  10. Seeing beauty often
  11. Seeing a black snake again
  12. Seeing cats a lot
  13. Seeing dogs a lot
  14. The hedgehog is frequent
  15. I often see owls and things like bats
  16. Seeing donkeys and pigs often ~> indicates evil jinn, and they dominate the Jewish and Christian religions
  17. Seeing insects and cockroaches often ~> indicates the weakest types of jinn who live in houses
  18. Seeing him often flying in a dream and falling from above indicates that he is of the flying type
  19. Frequent viewing of intercourse and what happens between couples ~> indicates a lover's touch
  20. Seeing graves and abandoned houses
  21. Seeing black men or women often
  22. I often see unknown women wearing black abayas without showing anything
  23. Seeing jinn often
  24. Envy in a dream indicates both good and evil, according to the nature of the dream that the person sees or even according to the dreamer's circumstances

Some dream symbols that indicate that they are jealous of you according to Ibn Sirin

Whoever sees poison in a dream, this indicates that there is magic in his house or that he is envied.
All kinds of snakes and snakes indicate the evil eye and envy from some people you didn't expect.

Seeing a dog and a pig in a dream indicates the presence of an envious person.

Seeing a deep well indicates envy in the dreamer's life.

Predatory animals, if you see them often, indicate envy.
The black snake in your dream indicates the evil eye and envy.

Dreaming about insects and cockroaches in a dream means envy.

Hedgehogs, donkeys, cats, and dogs in dreams all indicate envy.

Seeing an unknown house or an abandoned house or dark eggs or an empty house of all people in a dream indicates contamination with envy.

Whoever sees a toilet, bathroom, urine, feces, or blood, all of these symbols in a dream indicate that the dreamer is envious.
Seeing a camel means envy, provided that the dreamer sees it repeatedly.

Seeing beauty often indicates that the visionary is afflicted with envy or the evil eye.

Seeing the eye tearful indicates that the seer is envious or afflicted by the evil eye or touched by jinn or envy.
And seeing spies, thieves, graves, death, and the dead indicates that the seer has been tormented by envy for a long time.

Whoever sees a photographer, a camera, or electricity shows his envy.
And turning a human into an animal indicates the presence of envy or magic.
Whoever sees holes and eyes, these are a sign of envy.
Dreaming about circles indicates the presence of envy or the evil eye.
Excessive yawning can indicate envy.

Seeing the eye of magic for the door or glasses shows envy.
If you see yourself dreaming in a dream, this means that you are envied.

If you see a drawn eye in a dream, this is a sign of envy or magic.
And seeing animals looking at you or people looking at you all indicate envy or magic.
The presence of the letter "ain" in your dream indicates envy.

What are the symbols of envy and the evil eye in a dream?

  1. The symbol of the eye: the presence of a human or animal eye, whether in any place or in the form of pictures or drawings
  2. Baldness (alopecia): Seeing hair as if it has bald patches, either in one place or separately, let your eye sacrifice to envy.
  3. Circles: Display circular shapes and focus on them, whether they are shapes or solid patterns
  4. Scary looks: or strange looks emanating from people
  5. Pointing: either with a finger or with a pointer
  6. Excessive activity: a lot of movement that comes from activity, vitality, and movement or moving from one place to another while attracting attention.
  7. Surah al-Falaq : Seeing it in a dream means contamination with the evil eye, envy, and healing from it.
  8. In addition to some symbols that are already circulating, such as the symbol of the palm tree embedded in the necklace (khamsa), or the petal, or the broken glass, or the lemon on the trees.

Symbols that indicate healing from envy

Not seeing disturbing nightmares is an indication that the seer is concerned about envy and a sign of healing from the evil eye.
Your promise to see predatory animals or snakes or monkeys is an indication of healing from envy.
Feeling comfortable, feeling joy, and the arrival of happiness, the end of sadness, and the lack of feeling depressed, all indicate that you have been freed from the evil eye and envy.
If you see an envious person in a dream, this is an indication of getting rid of magic and envy.
Vomiting indicates getting rid of envy.
The appearance of white or red pimples on the body is a sign that magic and envy have come out of you.

Interpretation of a dream of envy in a dream

Interpreters and experts said that there is an indication of good and evil in a dream of seeing envy in a dream, but it depends on the circumstances of the person who has the vision, and based on that, Sheikh Ibn Sirin agreed with Sheikh Al-Nabulsi that the meaning of a dream of envy in a dream is that it is bad for the envious and good for the envious, and the meaning of this is that envy in a dream is good news for him that he will get good and righteous sustenance in his life, while envy is an indication that he will get...

title: Dream interpretation of a seal: Seeing a seal in a dream

preview.text: Dreaming about seals, like seeing a black seal, or a white seal, or the death of a seal, or killing a seal, or a sea lion in the dream of single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, according to Ibn Sirin, and others. Interpretation of the seal in the dream Seeing a seal in a dream means that the dreamer has big desires and projects that he cannot face alone, whether at work or in public life. Also, seeing it indicates that you will meet someone who will help you develop your project. Seeing many seals in a dream means that you will receive help from a group of people who invest in your project which will bring you profit. The presence of the white seal in the dream indicates the marriage of a single woman and stability and happiness for the married. Dreaming of a dead seal in a dream, or killing a seal, indicates that you feel anxious because of the illness of someone close to you. Seeing a seal being attacked by another animal, this dream indicates that there is a lot of envy in your environment. Seeing a seal in a dream in general indicates that the dreamer has big desires and projects that he cannot deal with alone, whether at work or in public life, and also means serious relationships, friendships, and romantic adventures. Seeing the seal for the religious who are planning to change their lives is a good omen for them with good results. Seals of a pregnant woman indicate that her childbirth will pass smoothly and easily. Seeing a seal for a man, if his wife is pregnant, means that God will bless him with a child. As for those who see themselves in a dream being attacked by seals, this is an indication of the presence of enemies in their environment. The dream of seals warns you that you are in a state of progress and success and that you are on the right track, but this does not mean that you can stop working actively on your future. The seal in a dream can also symbolize your high expectations of yourself. This can be a time when your relationships and commitments can be defined as you work to keep your spirits high. This amazing aquatic animal in the dream symbolizes trust and integrity. Seeing a seal in a dream means that you can easily adapt to emotional situations, although sometimes you don't take them seriously. When you see a seal in a dream, expect an invitation to a social event or a wedding. Killing a seal in a dream may mean that your work problems will worsen. The dream of seals can indicate the trust and integrity that we have with those around us. The seal in the dream may indicate that you are comfortable with the path you have chosen in life. If you dream of an injured seal, it may indicate that you have made choices that could harm you in the future. Review some of the choices you have made and see if they are in line with your moral values. Seeing seals on your path in a dream reminds you to tune in to your creative imagination and that you need to listen to your intuition to help you balance your life. Interpretation of the seal in the dream Seeing the seal in the dream expresses the dreamer's constant desire to show himself and his love for elegance, which drives him to spend a lot of money to show it off, and this can cause a lot of problems and disagreements for the dreamer in the future. Seeing a seal in a dream expresses the need to stop and be careful not to waste money. Whoever sees in a dream that the seal has climbed the wall, then it expresses the presence of the woman in the dreamer's life and seeks to control the realm of the seer and his possessions. Also, seeing the seal expresses the dreamer's reaching the highest degrees. Seeing a seal in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is suffering from a disease in his lungs or respiratory system. If one sees in a dream that he is hugging the seal and petting it, then this indicates positive and happy developments in the dreamer's life. Seeing the seal expresses the projects, formations, and plans that the seer adopts in his life to achieve his goals. Interpretation of the death of the seal in a dream Seeing a dead seal in a dream also reflects the existence of a new job or interest for the dreamer. Seeing a dead seal in a dream expresses the dreamer's feeling of fear and anxiety due to a problem or illness that affects someone close to you. Interpretation of the sea lion in the dream Seeing a sea lion in a dream means that there are many projects that the vision is planning but cannot be implemented alone, and seeing the sea lion may reflect the insight of receiving help from another person to develop their business and projects. Seeing many sea lions means that the dreamer will receive help from other people and they will invest in your work and project. Seeing a white seal Interpretation of the seal in a dream for a single woman Seeing the white seal indicates the marriage of the unmarried woman. Interpretation of the seal in a dream for a married woman Seeing the white seal expresses happiness and stability for the married. Interpretation of the seal in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing seals in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign of an easy childbirth, and seeing seals in a man's dream is a sign of the birth of a boy for the dreamer. Interpretation of eating a seal in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating a seal, then this indicates the loss of all his potential and possessions and the loss of his money. Anyone who dreams of feeding a seal represents the dreamer's efforts to earn money. Interpretation of many seals in a dream When you see many seals, it means peace and joy in many ways. The number of seals in the dream symbolizes the prosperity that will come at any moment. You should be an open person to all the changes that are coming. Interpretation of killing a seal in a dream When you dream of killing a seal, this is a sign that you are worried about the health of someone or a member of your family, which creates anxiety and sadness and leads to many bad changes. If a family member is suffering from a serious illness, then be prepared for the worst, such as death. Interpretation of seals and sharks in a dream If you dream of a shark eating a seal, it indicates that evil people are approaching you. They will do everything in their power to frustrate you, so it will be helpful to try to stay away from these people as best you can in every way. If you were able to escape from the evildoers, then beware of jealousy and betrayal from the people close to you. Interpretation of the death of the seal in a dream The dead seal symbolizes the fatigue you suffer from making your life stable in everything. It will be helpful to try to calm down a little, avoid too much stress, take breaks, and make changes gradually. Dreams of dead seals also indicate that others are influencing you, making you always immature in all kinds of situations. You should pay attention to this and stay away from the wrong people around you, they want to hurt you and make you take the wrong path. Interpretation of swimming with seals in a dream When you swim with seals, this dream symbolizes the new relationship that will come soon. Someone close to you will start to become an excellent person and a beautiful relationship will develop quickly. You won't be able to avoid it, enjoy this stage...

title: The Interpretation of Prayer in a Dream and Seeing Someone Praying According to Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
html

The interpretation of prayer in a dream shows the end of worry, exhaustion, sadness and other interpretations that we will explain for the single girl, married, pregnant, divorced and man as you prayed in a mosque or at home, or I dreamed that I was praying other than the qibla, according to Al-Nabulsi and Imam al-Sadiq and others.

Interpretation of prayer in a dream

  1. If you dream of staying praying in a dream, this means you need to let go of your fears and increase your confidence that things will work out.
  2. Also, the dream of establishing prayer indicates that you lack positive change in your life and should strive to achieve it.
  3. If you are going through many difficult times in life, and you see yourself praying in a dream, you will soon get rid of feelings of sadness and grief and replace them with positive feelings.
  4. Also, praying in a dream is a sign of good intentions that you are trying to achieve as soon as possible, and you can get them thanks to good deeds, because they do not prevent you from pursuing your goals.
  5. If you pray in fear in a dream, this indicates the fact that you want to achieve more in life but you are not doing anything about it. Instead, wait for someone to help you achieve it. This dream can be a small kick to help you succeed.
  6. If you prayed before you died in a dream, you feel guilty about the bad deeds you are doing, so if you are wrong, you will work to get rid of this feeling.
  7. Crying while praying in a dream means that you are afraid to ask for help from those close to you, even if you see them often. Therefore, you need to review your lifestyle and understand that you need the help of others to succeed in some things.
  8. If you prayed in a mosque during the dream, it will be easy for you to move towards your goal and you will be able to see things from a different perspective.
  9. Praying inside the mosque in the solution, the interpretation that you will get rid of stress and tension and enjoy peaceful and happy days.
  10. Praying with someone in a dream means that you have a strong relationship with this person
  11. If you prayed noon prayer obligatory in a dream and that day was cloudy, the dream involves worries.
  12. If you find yourself praying at noon at the time of Asr, you are paying off a debt you owe.
  13. If you prayed evening prayer in a dream, it means that the work you are doing will not last until you complete it.
  14. If you prayed Maghrib in a dream, you are doing things your family needs.
  15. If you are praying for dinner in a dream, you are treating your children in a way that makes their hearts happy.
  16. If you prayed while sitting without an excuse in a dream, your work will not be accepted.
  17. If you prayed while you are in a dream, severe fear harms you.
  18. If you prayed on cultivated land, your religion will be spent.
  19. Whoever sees that he is praying with women, he will take care of the affairs of the people of banks.
  20. Whoever sees that he has completed the prayer with women on the roof, he will improve with his people and improve his reputation among them.
  21. Whoever sees that he has finished his prayer and seeks forgiveness for the qibla, his supplication will be answered.
  22. Whoever sees that he is in prostration, his worry will disappear and his need will be satisfied.
  23. Whoever sees that he has left the obligatory prayer is far from the law of Allah.
  24. If you prayed in an orchard in a dream, you are seeking forgiveness from Allah.
  25. If you are worshiping Almighty Allah on a mountain, then he will triumph over an invincible man.
  26. If you see that you have completed the prayer completely in a dream, you relieve him of his worries, and if he faces right and not left, he will correct some of his affairs.

Another interpretation of the symbol of prayer in a dream

  1. Often, establishing prayer in a dream is interpreted as good for the one who saw it or saw it for him, and you will find below some aspects of its presence in dreams.
  2. Seeing establishing prayer in a dream means that you should let go of your worries that worry you and indicate trust and improvement in matters
  3. Establishing prayer in a dream also indicates a positive change in your life, especially if you are going through a difficult stage
  4. Seeing establishing prayer in a dream means achieving the goal and relief for those in distress
  5. Seeing establishing prayer on the door or on the bed indicates death
  6. As for the one who was imprisoned and saw that he was praying, the vision indicates his release
  7. Seeing establishing prayer indicates the beginning of success
  8. Whoever saw the call to prayer with the establishment indicates the revival of one of the Sunnah

Whoever sees that he is leading an unknown person to an unknown place and does not know what he is reciting, he is on the verge of death, so let him fear his Lord.

Whoever dreams that he prays noon or noon or darkness two rak'ahs then travels.

title: Interpretation of a dream about an old friend according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text: Seeing an old friend in a dream means that problems, disputes, and other interpretations are coming to an end. We will explain this for singles, married, pregnant, divorced, such as seeing colleagues or female friends, or hitting the old friend, or my friend visiting me at home, or the old friend's marriage according to Ibn Sirin, and more on the topic below: Interpretation of an old friend in a dream. Seeing an old friend in a dream indicates reconciliation with a lover, and the vision is an indication of an engagement that succeeds and ends in marriage. Anyone who sees an old friend in a dream means that the dreamer will start a new life and choose his friends, and that he will participate in classes and that he will make great efforts to improve his financial situation at work, and that he will hear good news. And that he will succeed in achieving his goals and will witness positive changes and share his happy life with his loved ones. Seeing an old friend in a dream indicates relationships that will end in separation and loss. Also, seeing an old friend in a dream indicates a request for help, especially with regard to material matters, and an indication that the fortune teller will live through difficult days and will ask for help and receive help, and thanks to this help, he will be able to stand on his feet again and be able to organize his work, as the debts of the seer will end and he will find solutions to his problems when he asks for material and moral help from those close to him. Seeing an old friend in a dream also shows his regret for doing a bad thing against his friend and that he always thinks about this matter and this matter will continue to affect him for a long time. Seeing elderly female friends in a dream, this vision indicates beautiful days, and this vision also indicates getting rid of problems and diseases and living in comfort. Seeing old friends shows joy, happiness and success, and this vision also reflects the longing of its owner and the desire to regain his memories with these friends. In case you saw an old friend in a dream, if the dreamer has a lover, this means that she will hurt him and that the dreamer does not care for her as he should, and if the dreamer does not have a relationship, this indicates his longing for his old lover. Seeing an old friend in a dream, this vision shows great success in the dreamer's professional life and that he will rise in positions, and shows that the dreamer is lucky and that he will not be able to seize the opportunities that come his way. Interpretation of the old friend in a dream according to Ibn Sirin When you see an old friend in a dream, it generally means that you want to relive the happy moments of life that you shared with him. This dream represents your desire to have a carefree, easy, and hassle-free life. The dream with an old friend indicates a state of pure comfort that you want in your waking life, but this does not happen in reality. This dream also talks about your desire to become irresponsible and enjoy more fun in your waking life. You want to live a comfortable life and these unfulfilled desires appear in dreams. Seeing an old friend also indicates good luck and prosperity in the near future. Interpretation of an old friend's wedding in a dream Seeing marriage to an old friend in a dream If the seer is single, this means that the seer will achieve his goals and that he will meet an understanding, honest, loving and kind-hearted girl, and that he will live a beautiful period where his success in the plans he has set for his life will appear, and it also indicates that the seer will neglect his family duties and responsibilities, which will lead him to separate from someone close to him. Interpretation of a conversation with an old friend in a dream Seeing talking to a friend in a dream means that the seer will establish a business partnership and make the right decisions at the right time, and this vision for singles indicates that they will enter into new romantic relationships. Seeing talking to an old friend in a dream indicates that there are ideas to make many changes for the dreamer and that person's desire to make those changes. Interpretation of meeting an old friend in a dream Seeing a meeting with an old friend in a dream means that the seer will live with serious problems and will face difficulties in paying his debts and will ask for help from someone close to him. Meeting an old friend in your dream means that the seer will meet a respected, knowledgeable and wise friend, and this vision for singles indicates marriage or that he will soon witness happy events. Interpretation of hitting an old friend in a dream Seeing yourself hitting an old friend in a dream means that the dreamer will face unexpected problems and difficulties, and this vision, according to some interpreters, indicates sins and gossip. Interpretation of killing an old friend in a dream Seeing an old friend being killed in a dream shows remorse and that the dreamer will realize the mistake of what he did and will regret it very much, but this repentance will not benefit the dreamer because he broke another person's heart and it will be a great effort to rectify the situation. The dream of killing an old friend has a negative connotation, which means that you harbor resentment and anger towards someone in your life. This dream represents negative feelings such as jealousy, anger, or frustration towards someone who must have done something wrong to you, it also indicates loss of temper and inability to maintain calm and humor in waking life. Seeing a fight with an old friend in a dream This means that you are angry and worried about what happened in reality and that the vision is a sign that some things have gone out of your control and control. Killing a friend in a dream means the end of something and can indicate failure and regret for your inability to achieve your life goals. Another example of a dream where you kill an old friend in a dream is that the killing is a sign of a possible change in front of you, and therefore it is recommended to leave your past and start from the beginning, as you will have to give up things that do not serve your best interests in life. Seeing a friend being killed in a dream means that you should focus on new opportunities and not let trivial things stop you in reality. Interpretation of hugging an old friend in a dream If you dream that you are hugging an old friend, it means that you are looking for some comfort in your waking life and you want someone to support you in times of need. Hugging a friend in a dream indicates your longing for emotional closeness with someone in your waking life, as you were with your old friend, this dream is also a positive sign and indicates old nostalgia and a deep desire to connect with someone close to you in reality. Sometimes hugging a friend in a dream indicates your state of mind.

title: Interpretation of seeing sadness and crying in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and prominent scholars

preview.html:
html

Sadness and Crying in a dream is one of the visions that carries many different meanings and interpretations that depend largely on the person's state in their dream and the nature of their social and psychological life in reality. Scholars have clarified in their interpretation of the dream of sadness and crying that it is an indication of depression and anxiety.

Sadness and Crying in a dream

  • Sadness and Crying in a dream is an indication of the bad psychological state that a person suffers from in reality, where they face a set of difficult problems that make them feel weak and exhausted, in addition to losing the ability to act. He continues in his life, and pressures.
  • Intense sadness and crying in a dream is an indication of the happy period that the dreamer will live in the near future, after the end of the worries, sorrows and disputes that were the reason for the destruction of his life in the past and his suffering from heartache and intense sadness. .
  • In general, the dream of sadness and crying refers to the difficult period that the seer is living through, which is characterized by many problems and problems, in addition to bad events that negatively affect his life and lead to his downfall. A large number of obstacles.

Sadness and Crying in a dream for Ibn Sirin

  • Ibn Sirin interprets sadness and crying in a dream as a sign of depression and intense distress as a result of the great loss that the dreamer suffers in his real life and finds it difficult to accept or compensate for it. The dream may indicate financial crises and accumulated debts.
  • The dream of sadness and crying indicates the unpleasant news and events that the dreamer will receive in the coming period, which will make him very sad and enter a state of depression and isolation, which will make him stay away from communicating with people. A short period of time.
  • In many cases, scholars interpret the dream of sadness and crying as an indication of the great regret that a person feels as a result of committing many sins and straying from the path of Almighty God to follow lusts.

Sadness and Crying in the dream of an unmarried woman

  • Sadness and Crying in a girl's dream, and the presence of her family and friends by her side, is an indication of the difficult period she is going through now, but there are some loyal people who support her and support her to overcome her ordeal in peace.
  • The dream of sadness and crying for a girl in her dream after someone refuses to ask her to marry her indicates that there is someone in reality who wants to get engaged to her, but she strongly refuses because she considers him unfit in addition to his state. The bad qualities that make everyone hate him, so the dreamer stays away from him so as not to get hurt.
  • Seeing a girl who is not married, sad and crying in a dream is a sign of rushing into making wrong decisions that have a negative impact on her personal and professional life.

What is the interpretation of crying over the dead for an unmarried woman?

  • Crying over the deceased in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates the difficulties and problems that the dreamer is going through in her real life, in addition to failure and incompetence as a result of the inability to achieve goals and aspirations, which leads to great sadness. .
  • Seeing a girl who is not married crying over a deceased person in a dream is a sign of accumulated debts on that person and his need to pay them off so that he feels comfort and peace in the afterlife. The dream may indicate the bad period that the dreamer is going through in life.

Crying in a dream is a good omen for an unmarried woman

  • Crying in a dream for a girl brings good news that indicates happiness and joy that the dreamer will live in the near future, in addition to acquiring many goods that will help her build a stable future and achieve the goal of life.
  • A dream of an unmarried woman crying in a dream indicates her marriage to a person of good character and qualities who treats her equally and their marital relationship will be very successful because it is based on kindness, affection and mutual respect between the two parties.
  • Crying in a dream indicates the end of sorrow and misery and the beginning of a new period in which the unmarried woman strives to reach her goal and pursue her dreams with all her energy and effort.

Sadness and crying in a dream for a married woman

  • Sadness and Crying in a woman's dream indicates the many disagreements that occur in her marital life, leading to a great separation between the two parties as a result of a lack of understanding and improper treatment.
  • Seeing a woman sad and crying profusely in a dream in the presence of her children indicates the sadness she feels in reality as a result of one of the children getting into a big problem that is difficult to solve, which affects the dreamer. And makes her cry all the time.
  • Sadness and Crying in a dream for a married woman is an indication of the loss of someone she loves or a great loss that the dreamer suffers and cannot compensate for, so she enters a state of shock and intense sadness.

What is the interpretation of intense crying in a dream for a married woman?

  • Intense crying in a woman's dream is an indication of the disappearance of sorrows, in addition to getting rid of the problems and obstacles that bothered her life in the previous period. The dream also shows feelings of joy, peace and comfort.
  • When a married woman sees her child sick in a dream and cries over him loudly, this indicates the success of her children in reality and achieving a distinguished position. Happiness and pride enter the dreamer's heart and put her in a state of satisfaction with what she has experienced.

Sadness and Crying in a dream for a pregnant woman

  • Sadness and Crying in a woman's dream when she was pregnant is an indication of the experiences she goes through during pregnancy, in addition to the severe fatigue and pain she feels as the delivery date approaches, where the fetus becomes unstable.
  • The dream of sadness and crying clarifies the health risks and damages that the dreamer suffers from, which greatly affect her child.
  • Seeing a pregnant woman crying profusely in a dream is an indication of the many problems that occur between her and her husband and his family, and this has a negative impact on her psychological and physical state and puts her in a state of sadness, anxiety and misery. .

Sadness and Crying in a dream for a divorced woman

  • Sadness and Crying in the dream of a divorced woman is an indication of the problems and difficulties she goes through in her life after separation, as she suffers from great sadness and shock as a result of things that happened between her and her ex-husband. .
  • The dream of intense sadness and crying in a dream for a divorced woman shows the wrong decisions that the dreamer made in the previous period that affected the stability of her life, in addition to falling into big problems that she was unable to get rid of. Or overcome easily.
  • In the case of someone sharing the dreamer's sadness and crying in a dream, then the dream is an indication of the happiness and joy that she feels in the near future and may express her marriage to the coming period from a generous person who gives it to her. It suits her and compensates her for the bad things she went through in the past.

Sadness and Crying in a man's dream

  • The dream of sadness and crying in a man's dream is an indication of the problems and obstacles he faces in his professional life, which lead to …
